metadata.title: CVE-2022-2165 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in URL formatting in Google Chrome prior to103.0.5060.53 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via IDNhomographs via a crafted domain name.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
